name: Tea Ais
description: Tea Ais is Ice Tea with condensed milk. Its name is derived from the pouring of 'pulling' the drink during preparation.
directions: Steep the tea bags covered in the hot water for 5-8 minutes.
Mix in the milk and sugar.
Prepare two containers, preferably with curved lips to ease pouring with minimal dripping.
With a steady stream, pour the tea from one container to the other back and forth.
Carefully increase the height as your pour.
The higher the steam, the frothier it'll become.
Be careful not to scald yourself.
Adds some ice cubes and serve.
